message.content: {"given_definition_quality":15,"better_definition":"an adult female person; woman","sentence":"女人在家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation of an adult woman standing inside a simple home. The woman is clearly female and stands in a relaxed pose. The background shows soft light entering through a window, with subtle signs of an apocalyptic atmosphere outside (e.g., distant ruined buildings, strange glowing sky). The style is animated and a bit dreamy, with muted colors and soft shadows.","sentence_translation":"The woman is at home."}
